galleryData.description:
Ear hugs!!!

A card for a wonderful mother of two adorable "bunnies". Lucy Fan is the angrier bunny. Happy mother's day everyone!
Happy birthday Yanny!!! Bring back some pineapple cakes from Taiwan!
For a special bird loving mother. Tyler Poon is the twig ;). Happy early mother's day!
A card for my awesome mom in memory of our adventure at Point Pelee!

Ink and Watercolour Card

My best attempt to combine tea, car, camera, lipstick XD!

Ink and Watercolour Card

Urgot Poros!!!

Ink and Watercolour Card

Inspired by my awesome friend Lucy Fan's bunnies and those good old sleeping parties back in UW.

Ink and Gouache Card

My very first robot design! SAHU (short for Secure Animal Housing Unit) is an animal loving robot that takes care of injured animals :).
Happy Birthday Andrew!! Here's to another year of friendship :).

Ink and Watercolour Card

A robot design for a durian lover. DEP1 (short for Durian Extraction Processor 1) chops, opens, and cuts durians. The goods are transported to a conveyor belt directly to the boss so they can be enjoyed fresh!
Just make sure not to stink up my house with your fancy new robot >:P

Ink and Watercolour Card

This simple card was created for a birthday girl nicknamed "Ya Ya", which is a homonym with "ducks" in Chinese.
